Package GameEngine

Interface ICollider

All Known Subinterfaces:
IFood, IObstacle
All Known Implementing Classes:
DynamicObstacle, FoodCircle, FoodSquare, SnakeUnit, StaticObstacle
public interface ICollider
Represents a game object that can collide
See Also:
  • GameObject
  • CollisionManager

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    IGeometricShape<?>
    getCollider()
    The collider's shape, also commonly refered to as a 'hitbox'
    boolean
    isDeepCollision()
    If the Collider should test for deep collisions.
    void
    onCollision(GameObject other)
    Event triggered when a collision occurs Should only be called by the collision manager.

  • Method Details

    • onCollision

      void onCollision(GameObject other)
      Event triggered when a collision occurs Should only be called by the collision manager.
      Parameters:
      other - the game object that collided with the current one

    • getCollider

      IGeometricShape<?> getCollider()
      The collider's shape, also commonly refered to as a 'hitbox'
      Returns:
      the collider's shape, also commonly refered to as a 'hitbox'

    • isDeepCollision

      boolean isDeepCollision()
      If the Collider should test for deep collisions. Deep collisions use inclusive intersection and are also triggered if one collider contains the other.
      Returns:
      if the collider should test for deep collisions
